chess - package chess
 
Chess - Class in chess
Main class to run a Chess application
Chess() - Constructor for class chess.Chess
 
ChessBoard - Class in chess
Class to represent a ChessBoard This class contains the members such as current player , chess pieces, game status etc, which is required to simulate the chess game.
ChessBoard() - Constructor for class chess.ChessBoard
Create a ChessBoard with a SIDE*SIDE chess cells.
ChessBoardCell - Class in chess
Class representing the cell of a ChessBoard.
ChessBoardCell(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class chess.ChessBoardCell
Create a cell wiht given row,col index and color
ChessBoardCell(int, int, boolean, ChessPiece) - Constructor for class chess.ChessBoardCell
Method to create the cell with specific color and piece on the specific row/col index.
ChessBoardCell(ChessBoardCell) - Constructor for class chess.ChessBoardCell
method to create the copy of a cell with the piece.
ChessPiece - Class in chess
Class representing a chess piece in the game of chess.
ChessPiece(PieceType, Player) - Constructor for class chess.ChessPiece
Method to create a chesspiece with given symbol and owner
